lines.text: Now we made a bargain. I'm gonna build you a church and you'll gonna lead me to some gold. Remember? But, Lord, you're not helping at all!
I figure I'll meet the Apaches sooner or later. I guess I'd rather it be later.

[handing Pitcalin a flintlock rifle]
Whatcha doin' with such an old timer, Mr Pitcalin?
Hey, Pitcalin, if I come across your carcasses, I'll toss a cactus flower on'em.
